title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.7 - Records of all races
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.7 - Records of all races

State Regulations

The racing secretary shall keep a complete record of all
races run, and of all violations of the rules of racing and shall report such
violations to the steward. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4223.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
